title: Keep getting connection issue once I start to load into game
body: Over the last week I've been struggling getting into game. I get an error as soon as the champion loading screen would normally start before a game. I hit retry, nothing. I hit cancel and it takes me back to the client, urging me to reconnect, I do that and get the same error. I force quit and restart the client and I still get the same error. It's frustrating because I get punished for being afk, when in all reality I'm sitting here doing everything I can to connect. This issue started about a week ago, give or take, and I had just been playing a week before that with no issues at all. If there's something that can be done to fix this, I'd really like to know. Thanks!

replies.body: Sounds like your network was having some weird troubles getting a good signal from our game servers for some reason. There might be something blocking your network from being able to reach us, so let's make sure to check out the steps on port forwarding and flushing your DNS on this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).
Same I have no idea whats going on
